title: Ep - 54 - BONUS EPISODE - D’Andra Simmons from Real Housewives of Dallas
description:
D’Andra Simmons from Real Housewives of Dallas is one of the crown jewels of the city’s social scene. In this interview she discusses how she was cast for the show, her mother’s inspiring career, her personal experience with domestic abuse, and overcoming personal obstacles.
